reviews.text: The sushi was absolutely amazing!! I had to order seconds it was that good. Definitely recommend the red white and boom sushi.
Yuck. This used to be my favorite Sushi restaurant. It's gross now. The quality of the ingredients has gone down hill to the point I will not eat here ever...
This restaurant is a little tucked away but worth a visit. It was a chilly night so I wanted something warm and this meal hit the spot. The miso soup was...
